description: ABT = 20 000, PHR awal = 600, PHR baharu 4% atas ABT.
explain: PHR baharu = 20 000 x 4% = 800. PHR naik 200 → Belanja Hutang Ragu 200, PHR akhir 800.

description: ABT = 6 750, tiada PHR awal, diwujudkan PHR 2% atas ABT.
